title: Beautifully animated
review: This is my first Studio Ghibli film and then I realised why people revere the studio. The animation is quite beautiful.

title: Entertaining
review: A bit confusing but ultimately a very enjoyable watch.

title: Meh
review: I did not enjoy this the way so many people do.I do like Chihiro though.

title: Hmm
review: I did not enjoy this the way so many people do. The boars were very repulsive.
